name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Press
setup: Lie flat on bench with one dumbbell in hand
Free hand can rest on torso or at side
Shoulder blades pulled back and down
steps: Start with dumbbell at chest level
Press weight straight up over chest
Control the descent back to chest
mistakes: Allowing torso to rotate during press
Pressing weight out instead of up
safety: Start lighter than bilateral press to master stability. Stop if lower back arches excessively.

regressions: Feet up on bench for more stability

prescriptionHints.notes: Focus on core stability and control

joints.notes: Maintain neutral spine and avoid compensations. Core engagement is key.
